testcase.name: To add new customer
testcase.system-out: Given user launch chrome browser............................................passed And search for "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login?ReturnUrl=%2Fadmin%2F".passed And user enters email as "admin@yourstore.com" and password as "admin"......passed And click on login..........................................................passed Then user can view dashboard................................................passed Then click on customer menu.................................................passed Then click on customers menu item...........................................passed And click on Add new button.................................................passed Then user is redirected to the add new customer page........................passed And user fill all customer details..........................................passed Then click on Save button...................................................passed And close the browser.......................................................passed

testcase.name: To search customer by email
testcase.system-out: Given user launch chrome browser............................................passed And search for "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login?ReturnUrl=%2Fadmin%2F".passed And user enters email as "admin@yourstore.com" and password as "admin"......passed And click on login..........................................................passed Then user can view dashboard................................................passed Then click on customer menu.................................................passed Then click on customers menu item...........................................passed And enter customer email....................................................passed And click on Search button..................................................passed Then user should find thet customer in the list of customer table...........passed And close the browser.......................................................passed
